greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Minimal number of distinct nonzero tetrahedral numbers needed to represent n, or -1 if no such representation is possible.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: if member(n, tets) and n < tmax then return 1 fi;
results.author: _Jud McCranie_, Mar 01 2005
